name: Train of Fear Hidden Object Mystery Case Game
name_original: Train of Fear Hidden Object Mystery Case Game
description:
Solve the mysterious criminal case! There was a homicide a week ago in the train and nobody knows who did it. A famous archaeologist and an adventurer was murdered and his valuable maps and diaries were stolen. Play Train of Fear Hidden Object Mystery Case Game and find lost evidence that can help you catch a criminal. This is the best seek and find hidden object game that will challenge your concentration and help you become a true police detective. Try it now for free!


🚂 Train of Fear Hidden Object Mystery Case Game features:

🚂 Mystery crime game free localized into 15 languages!
🔍 More than 1000 hidden objects to find in this ghost train!
🚂 Multiple levels of scary train full of magic hidden objects!
🔍 Fantastic train 3D game design that will leave you speechless!
🚂 Find the hidden object from the card below & click on it!
🔍 Click on the magnifying glass button to use help you find items!
🚂 For mobile phones only! - Zoom in the picture to find the objects!
🔍 Move the picture when it is zoomed to find the hidden object!
🚂 Zoom out at any moment you like to see the mystery scene again!


🚂 Additional mystery adventure hidden object game features:

🔍 Picture search for finding hidden objects quickly and easily!
🔍 Silhouette hidden object – a challenging level for finding items!
🔍 Word scramble game level – find figures in anagrams!
🔍 Flashlight or a night mode level – use the light to seek for items!
🔍 Match Pairs – a memory game with colorful cards to pair!
🔍 Find the Difference – spot the difference between the two pictures!
🔍 Time limit game - bonus level to train your brain and concentration!
🔍 Tile puzzle game – put the puzzle pieces together to make a picture!


Find hidden objects in pictures and be the best police detective who will solve this mystery case. Play this forensics crime scene investigation game to find hidden figures that can lead you to the murderer. The victim was a famous explorer and adventurer and one of the most successful treasure hunters. He was coming back from the expedition where he had found an ancient temple in the lost city. He had probably found some very valuable relics and jewels. He also had a diary full of maps of the lost pirate treasure. Play Train of Fear Hidden Object Mystery Case Game and find out who wanted to murder him and steal everything he had.

Search and find hidden objects and discover the truth of the steam train!

This object searching game will boost your concentration and make you have an eye for details. Improve your detective skills with this Train of Fear Hidden Object Mystery Case Game and have fun all day. Explore this scary train of horror and find as many hidden objects form the list as you can and try to find some valuable evidence. If you like train hijack games in the subway you will certainly love this seek and find train game. It is perfect for crime scene investigation game that will lead you to the greatest adventure in your life.

Best mystery train games free for all generations!

This spooky Halloween train is the top hidden object game 2019 for boys and girls of all ages. This mystery crime scene cleanup game hides many secrets inside. There are a lot of mini games that will help you improve your concentration and kill your boredom. “Find the difference game” will challenge your searching skills and boost your focus. Memory game with cards is a perfect brain teaser. But most of all this is the best language learning game on the market. This object searching game is translated into 15 most popular world languages. You just need to pick a language you want to learn and play the police game with hidden objects in a scary ghost train for free. Download Train of Fear Hidden Object Mystery Case Game right now, dare to enter the old subway and investigate crime scene!
